blocks.subject: Re: Meter 5892
text: I spoke with Karen Lindley about volume not being allocated.  She said that
she passed it on to Fred Boas.

blocks.cc: Fred Boas/HOU/EES@EES, Melissa Graves/HOU/ECT@ECT, Karen  Lindley/Corp/Enron@ENRON
blocks.subject: Re: Meter 5892
raw_header: cc: Fred Boas/HOU/EES@EES, Melissa Graves/HOU/ECT@ECT, Karen
text: I have done deals with John at this point.  Why are we not being allocated

blocks.to: Fred Boas/HOU/EES@EES, Daren J Farmer/HOU/ECT@ECT, Melissa  Graves/HOU/ECT@ECT
blocks.subject: Meter 5892
raw_header: To: Fred Boas/HOU/EES@EES, Daren J Farmer/HOU/ECT@ECT, Melissa
text: I am getting several phone calls from Alpine Resources demanding to be paid
for meter 5892 and there is nothing there to be paid.
The person name doing the requesting is John Childers and he said that he
spoke to Daren Farmer.  He is looking for 859 mmbtu's for December, 2000 and
3,251 mmbtu's for January 2001 .  This is on the Katy Gas Unit.  If anyone
would like to talk to John his phone number is 281-646-0232
